No, it's not the capital of Australia.
Although Sydney is the most famous and populous city in Australia,...
Like any big city, it has many attractions...
...such as the Opera House and the Bay Bridge.
This city certainly has it all:...
...incredible landscapes, beautiful beaches, lots of nightlife and museums.
If you want to enjoy an excellent view of the city,...
...you can go up to the Tower Eye Observatory.
There's much more to do in this modern city...
